Leading a software company that specializes in building SaaS, Mobile and Analytics Solutions. Serving customers including fortune 500 clients to develop and maintain software

- Co-founded and started company as CEO- Refined product idea through three iterations to finally arrive on viable solution- Architected, Design & Developed Minimum Viable Product (MVP) in partnership with Interbiz Consulting- Secured first two pilot customers- Successfully raised funds and got promoted to CIO (yes, promoted)

- Phoenix-based angel investment group that invests in early stage technology companies. - Invested in multiple software, SaaS, healthcare & internet of things companies over the years. - Performed investment due diligence on multiple software / SaaS companies. Diligence outcome was directly proportional to investment.- Provided coaching to various startups
Provided mentoring to startup and entrepreneurs with ideas. Establish the connective tissue required for a vibrant entrepreneurial ecosystem.

Implementation through a flexible staffing model which leverages cross-functional teams comprised of employees, vendors, outsource partners, and contractors- Developed architecture for a multiple systems that suits the business needs, satisfies stakeholder requirements, and achieves the desired results under given constraints at enterprise level. - Proven ability to drive complex technical solutions which may include legacy, COTS, Cloud and converging technology use at an enterprise level and business process change through education, influence and partnership with stakeholders.- Linked technology roadmaps to end-to-end IT services to align technology investments with IT and business objectives. recommendations: Yashwanth Prakash
Strategy and General Management
October 19, 2015, Pankaj worked with Yashwanth but at different companies

I have had the pleasure to interact with Yash at SnapBizz, I must say he is a problem solver, very analytical in his approach and he can execute; not just strategist. His core strength I noticed is in his ability to connecting the dots and identifying problems in advance (be it product or a business challenge), rallying up team members and guide them to quickly arrive at a solution and iterate fast. He is passionate about value addition and value delivery at the same time being practical about execution challenges. He is one of the few people I know who's both technical and has sharp business acumen. I would love to have him in my company any day.

summary: Senior IT leader with 18+ years of progressively challenging experience in cloud infrastructure & technologies (SAAS, PAAS, IAAS), enterprise mobility, identity & access management, architecture, design and development of enterprise applications. An inspirational, hands-on leader who builds and integrates team across discipline, geography & organization to successfully deliver strategic solutions that meets and exceeds the business goals. Unified technology strategy and vision across business domains, instilled core processes and systems to drive IT decision. Provided leadership to successfully complete complex projects with budgets $10+ M and 1,000,000+ users. Successfully completed 20+ high-profile projects across the life cycle. Exceptional problem solving skills regularly applied to streamline people, process & technology.Key Skills:o	Information Security: Identity & access management / Single Sign On / Profile Management / Digital Signature / Data Privacy / Complianceo	Enterprise Architecture: IT Strategy / Governance / Products & Solution Design / Development / Support o	Cloud Computing: SAAS, PAAS, IAAS / Integration - Enterprise network, private & public cloudo	Middle Tier: SOA, API Management, Data Virtualization, Enterprise Service Bus, Manageability & Monitoring, Load Balanceo	Masterdata: Master Data Management / Data Governance and Stewardship / Data Strategy / Analytics / Complianceo	Financial Planning: Budgeting / Cost Management / Resource Management / Priority Identification / Program & Portfolio Managemento	Software Development: Agile / Feature Driven Development / Test Driven Development / Extreme Programming / Risk Managemento	Technologies: SAML, OAuth2.0, OpenID Connect (JWT), Data Modeling, C#, C/C++, WebAPI, ASP.NET, Java, SQL, SQL Server, Oracle, MySql, Php, AngularJS, Cordova, REST, HTML5, JavaScript
